Export.FileName: 儿童保健和健康情况表（2019年版）.xlsx

SQLs.SQL: select jg.dizhimc ,jg.dizhibm ,hc.* from ( select dizhibm,dizhimc from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc ) jg left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, count(*) huochanzs, sum(case when nr.babysex=1 then 1 else 0 end) huochannan, sum(case when nr.babysex=2 then 1 else 0 end) huochannv, sum(case when nr.babysex!=1 and nr.babysex!=2 then 1 else 0 end)huochanbm from cdh_newbornrecord nr left join cdh_deliveryrecord dr on nr.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on dr.visitunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where nr.outcomeofbirth = 1 and dr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and dr.tianbiaosj < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) hc on jg.dizhibm = hc.dizhibm

select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,cc.birthDay,cc.createDate)/365.25) <=3 then 1 else 0 end) child3, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,cc.birthDay,cc.createDate)/365.25) <=5 then 1 else 0 end) child5, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,cc.birthDay,cc.createDate)/365.25) <=7 then 1 else 0 end) child7 from cc_generalinfo cc left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on cc.createUnit = subjg.fuwujgbh where cc.status = 0 and cc.createDate >= @日期范围Start and cc.createDate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by subjg.dizhibm

select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 then 1 else 0 end) babys, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 AND d.babysex = '1' then 1 else 0 end) babynans, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 AND d.babysex = '2' then 1 else 0 end) babynvs, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 AND d.babysex != '1' and d.babysex != '2' then 1 else 0 end) babybms from perinataldeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on d.entryunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by subjg.dizhibm

select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY, d.birthday, d.deathdate)/365.25) <1 then 1 else 0 end) yiners, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY, d.birthday, d.deathdate)/365.25) <1 and d.childsex='1' then 1 else 0 end) yinersnan, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY, d.birthday, d.deathdate)/365.25) <1 and d.childsex='2' then 1 else 0 end) yinersrnv, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY, d.birthday, d.deathdate)/365.25) <1 and d.childsex !='2' and d.childsex != '1' then 1 else 0 end) yinersbm, count(*) wusuizs, sum(case when d.childsex= '1' then 1 else 0 end) wusuizsnan, sum(case when d.childsex= '2' then 1 else 0 end) wusuizsnv, sum(case when d.childsex!='2' and d.childsex!='1' then 1 else 0 end) wusuizsbm, count(*) wusuisw from underfiveyearsdeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on d.entryunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by subjg.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, sum(case when visitMonth<=6 and d.type= 1 then 1 else 0 end) muruzs, sum(case when visitMonth<=6 and d.type= 1 and d.feedingway<> '3' then 1 else 0 end) muruwy, sum(case when visitMonth<=6 and d.type= 1 and d.feedingway = '1' then 1 else 0 end) murucwy, sum(case when visitMonth<= 36 then 1 else 0 end) jkguanlis, sum(gl.guanli) guanlis, count(*) qisuibjs from cc_physicalexam_new d left join GY_FUWUJG jg on d.followAgencyCode = jg.fuwujgbh LEFT JOIN( SELECT subjg.dizhibm ,d.childid, glb.birthDay ,dbo.erTongGL_CKL(glb.birthDay, convert(date, @日期范围Start,23),convert(date, @日期范围End,23),COUNT(*)) AS guanli FROM cc_physicalexam_new AS d left JOIN cc_generalinfo AS glb ON d.childid = glb.childid left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on d.followAgencyCode = subjg.fuwujgbh where d.status = 1 and d.inputDate >= @日期范围Start and d.inputDate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) and FLOOR(datediff(DY, glb.birthDay, d.inputDate)/365.25)<=3 GROUP BY d.childid,glb.birthDay,subjg.dizhibm ) gl on gl.childid = d.childid and jg.dizhibm = gl.dizhibm where d.status = 1 and d.inputDate >= @日期范围Start and d.inputDate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by jg.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, count(*) xinshengfs from cc_neonatalvisitrecord d left join GY_FUWUJG jg on d.followAgencyCode = jg.fuwujgbh where d.status = 1 and d.inputDate >= @日期范围Start and d.inputDate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by jg.dizhibm

select cc.dizhibm, sum(case when cc.nutritionStatus is not null and cc.nutritionStatus != '' then 1 else 0 end) tzjcrs, sum(case when cc.nutritionStatus= '2' then 1 else 0 end) dtzrs, sum(case when cc.nutritionStatus= '4' then 1 else 0 end) szchrs, sum(case when cc.nutritionStatus= '5' then 1 else 0 end) czrs, sum(case when cc.nutritionStatus in ('7','8','9') then 1 else 0 end) fprs, sum(case when cc.anemia is not null and cc.anemia != '' then 1 else 0 end) pxjcrs, sum(case when cc.anemia in ('2','3') then 1 else 0 end) px23rs, sum(case when cc.anemia in ('1','2''3','4') then 1 else 0 end) px1234rs from( select d.id, d.childid, d.nutritionStatus, subjg.dizhibm, d.anemia, ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by d.childid, subjg.fuwujgbh order by d.inputDate, d.id desc) px from cc_physicalexam_new d left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on d.followAgencyCode = subjg.fuwujgbh where d.status = 1 and d.inputDate >= @日期范围Start and d.inputDate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) )cc where cc.px = 1 group by cc.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, sum(case when d.pupil = '1' or d.pupil = '2' then 1 else 0 end) u6sljcrs, sum(case when visitMonth >= 72 AND (d.lefteye is not null or d.righteye is not null) then 1 else 0 end) jcrs, sum(case when visitMonth >= 72 AND ((d.lefteye is not null and d.lefteye< 1.0) or(d.righteye is not null and d.righteye< 1.0)) then 1 else 0 end) ycrs from cc_physicalexam_new d left join GY_FUWUJG jg on d.followAgencyCode = jg.fuwujgbh where d.status = 1 and d.inputDate >= @日期范围Start and d.inputDate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by jg.dizhibm
